markdownRemark.html: Located in the heart of Nueva Andalucia, in the so-called Golf Valley, is the Real Las Brisas Golf Club, one of the most traditional courses of the Costa del Sol. The course has a multiple of obstacles of water, in example ten artificial lakes fed by two streams. The greens are mostly high and protected by bunkers.The terrace restaurant/bar is great and very fairly priced whilst the service is lovely and the view, even more-so.

frontmatter.title: Real Club de Golf Las Brisas

The course has a multiple of obstacles of water, in example ten artificial lakes fed by two streams. The greens are mostly high and protected by bunkers.The terrace restaurant/bar is great and very fairly priced whilst the service is lovely and the view, even more-so.
